name: action-hooks
description: Manages action hooks and notifications

name: metrics-tracker
description: Central metrics tracking system for OSA

name: self-learning
description: Main self-learning system for OSA

name: persistent-memory
description: Persistent memory system for OSA

name: lang-chain
description: LangChain-powered intelligence engine for OSA

name: task-planner
description: Autonomous task planning and execution system

name: o-s-a-autonomous
description:
Autonomous OSA that automatically determines what to do
    based on user input without manual mode switching.

name: o-s-a-logger
description:
Real-time logger for OSA activities.
    Sends logs to web interface via WebSocket.

name: l-l-m
description: Orchestrates multiple LLMs for optimal task completion

name: agent
description: Multi-agent orchestrator using LangGraph

name: m-c-p-client
description: MCP Client for OSA to connect to various MCP servers

name: code-generator
description: Advanced code generation system for OSA

name: continuous-thinking
description:
OSA's continuous thinking engine that enables human-like
    deep reasoning, multi-context awareness, and adaptive problem-solving.

name: daily-architecture-reviewer
description:
OSA's self-improvement system that:
    - Reviews architecture daily
    - Researches better tools
    - Implements improvements
    - Stays current with best practices

name: continuous-learning
description:
OSA's continuous learning component that enables:
    - Learning from user feedback
    - Internal research and debates
    - Pattern recognition to avoid repetition
    - Smart work over hard work

name: ollama-provider
description:
Provider for local LLMs via Ollama.
    
    Supports:
    - Llama 3.2
    - Mixtral
    - DeepSeek Coder
    - Any model Ollama supports

name: provider
description:
Manages multiple LLM providers.
    
    This class:
    - Registers and manages providers
    - Routes requests to appropriate providers
    - Handles failover between providers
    - Tracks usage and costs

name: base-provider
description:
Abstract base class for all LLM providers.
    
    Every provider (Ollama, OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.) must implement this interface.
    This ensures OmniMind can work with any LLM seamlessly.

name: omni-mind
description:
Claude Code Agent wrapper for OmniMind.
    
    This agent can be invoked by Claude Code to:
    - Remember project decisions and context
    - Provide advice based on past experiences
    - Build consensus from multiple LLMs
    - Search through accumulated knowledge

name: agent-registry
description:
Registry for all available OmniMind agents.
    
    This registry allows Claude Code to discover and use
    specialized agents with persistent memory.

name: open-source-extractor
description:
Autonomous agent for identifying, extracting, and publishing
    open source projects from OSA codebase

name: open-source-solution-finder
description:
Agent that finds open source solutions BEFORE writing custom code
    and identifies replacement opportunities in existing codebase

name: base-omni-mind
description:
Base class for all OmniMind-powered Claude Code agents.
    
    Every specialized agent inherits:
    - Persistent memory across sessions
    - Multi-model intelligence (5 local LLMs)
    - Semantic knowledge search
    - Contextual awareness
    - Learning from past decisions

name: core
description: Extracted core module from OSA

name: providers
description: Extracted providers module from OSA

name: agents
description: Extracted agents module from OSA
